title: HUD UPDATE CLASSIC OPTION
body: Some people would prefer the classic hud instead of the updated one, I think it would be a great idea to add a classic option to the hud like riot did with the music.

replies.body: Definitely agree with this, i'd love to have to option to slowly get used to the new HUD, e.g. use the old HUD in ranked games for a while and the new one in normals
